name: Solarmovie(z) Dark
description:
Solarmovie Dark is a CSS theme for Stylish and Stylus that applies the following changes on https://solarmovie.one/ website:
  • ⚫ Shifting aesthetics up to a more pleasing, non-eye-burning dark theme.
  • ⚫ Improvement of other aesthetics and usability issues.
  • ⚫ Removal of social sharing buttons, annoying ads, sponsor content and other unnecessary elements.
Go Dark and never look back, your eyes will thank you! Any suggestions or comments, please feel free to drop a feedback at the bottom of this page.
additional_info: [v2.0.0] 2021/10/20 - Upgrade ▬ Issues ⚫ Updated dark theme for new domain(s). ▬ New feature ⚫ Removed unnecessary elements. [v1.2.0] 2017/12/14 - Upgrade ▬ New feature ⚫ Added Dark theme to Home page. ▬ Issues ⚫ Removed Social Sharing buttons from Home page. ⚫ Removed sponsor content from Firefox. [v1.1.0] 2017/05/19 - Upgrade ▬ Issues ⚫ Removed Social Sharing buttons from Chrome and Firefox. ⚫ Removed annoying ads from Chrome and Firefox. [v1.0.0] 2017/05/18 - Initial release ▬ Core ⚫ Dark theme. ▬ Issues ⚫ Added fixed top menu. ⚫ Added rounded border on movie list items.

discussions.name: looks good. doesnt black out what i need. thumbs up
